title: Anmol Polki Jhumka - The Royal 'Kundan' Earring
materials: Emerald accents. All gemstones are carefully sourced for their natural beauty and brilliance.
features: Classic Jhumka design featuring a floral top with a central Polki diamond encircled by smaller diamonds. The lower dome showcases a lotus motif crafted with Polki diamonds and vibrant emeralds, reflecting traditional 'Kundan' craftsmanship. The setting is meticulously done to enhance the brilliance of each stone.
colors: Predominantly gold with flashes of white (diamonds) and green (emeralds). A rich and regal combination that's synonymous with South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi (సంక్రాంతి)
and other grand celebrations where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: A timeless piece showcasing the beauty of Polki diamonds, handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad. The intricate Kundan work, combined with the richness of 22K gold and the vibrancy of emeralds, makes it a truly unique and heirloom-worthy piece. The 'Hyderabadi Polish' enhances the gold's luster, ensuring long-lasting shine and durability.
